response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us due to its unique features and the quality materials used in its production. I am extending this opportunity to you with the hope that it will bring significant value to your endeavors. Please consider the following offer: $14,000 for the product. Should you have any questions or require more information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
